p: da Silva et al. [ 32] report the main compounds in the EO obtained from the flowers as α-pinene (28.7%), β-pinene (38.2%), ( E)-β-ocimene (9.8%), and β-caryophyllene (14.0%), and the main compounds in the EO obtained from the stems as: α-pinene (17.3%), β-pinene (27.0%), (E)-β-ocimene (14.5%), and β-caryophyllene (32.1%).
